abstract: Defense Sec Ashton B Carter says United States strategy for combating Islamic State militants in Iraq and Syria is sound and that American military can balance risk of arming and training Syrian rebels.
lead_paragraph: Defense Secretary Ashton B. Carter said Monday that the United States now needed to better use the assistance of other countries in the international coalition that has come together to fight the Islamic State.

headline.main: Defense Chief Vouches for U.S. Strategy on ISIS
headline.print_headline: Defense Chief Vouches for U.S. Strategy on ISIS

snippet: Defense Secretary Ashton B. Carter said Monday that the United States now needed to better use the assistance of other countries in the international coalition that has come together to fight the Islamic State.
